name: Sun
tip: Inspire means you have extra breath next round, Inspired means you have it this round.

name: Moon
tip: If a Rooster is on top of a Morning card, Moon gets to trigger it twice. And 2 Moons can trigger it 3 times!

name: Sunflower
tip: Nourishing a Sunflower lets you ramp into strong cards early.

name: Pride
tip: Pride will always discard the leftmost card and cost 1 breath, so try to stack your hand so you get rid of what you don't want.

name: Fates
tip: Since Exhale happens when a card resolves not when it's played, you could choose to play more cards instead of leaving the Breath up depending on if the opponent plays more cards or not.

name: Cloak of Stars
tip: The Breath that Cloak of Stars adds can be used for Exhale effects, or will carry over to the next round if the Morning trigger occurs.

name: Night Vision
tip: Make sure you have a card with base-cost 2 in your deck or Night Vision won't draw anything.

name: Dreamer
tip: As long as your hand is empty when Dreamer resolves, it will draw a card.

name: Possibility
tip: Your breath naturally goes up from 1 to 10 each round, but with Possibility it can go up to 11!
